SocialMediaPosting.headline: Miss Jenny Zhu’s Story - Pittsburgh Student - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, We should realize small things are where racism originate: Name discrimination, backhanded compliments, ignorant jokes we need to eliminate…”

– Miss Jenny Zhu, Senior Student @NA_Schools https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/realize-small-things-are-where-racism-originate/
